message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
I appreciate you meeting me in the middle, but $130 is still a little more than I'm willing to pay. How about we split the difference at $125?
I'm glad we're close, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go.
